projects.name: AI Quiz Generator (Web)
projects.description: A full-stack MERN application that leverages the Google Gemini API to automatically generate multiple-choice quizzes from uploaded PDF notes.

projects.name: Uber Clone
projects.description: A full-stack MERN ride-sharing web. Features real-time location tracking, ride matching for Riders/Drivers, and fare estimation using Socket.IO and Google Maps API.

projects.name: AI Quiz App (iOS)
projects.description: A native iOS quiz application built with SwiftUI. Features user authentication, document uploading (PDFs), and AI-powered quiz generation with a results review screen.
